  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codisimus.plugins.phatloots.loot.Loot

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable, org.bukkit.configuration.serialization.ConfigurationSerializable

    public class Item
extends Loot
    An Item is the Loot representation of an ItemStack

    Codisimus

      • modifyAmount

        public boolean modifyAmount(int amount,
                   boolean both)
        Modifies the amount associated with the Loot
        Specified by:
        modifyAmount in class Loot
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to modify by (may be negative)
        both - true if both lower and upper ranges should be modified, false for only the upper range
        Returns:
        true if the Loot InfoStack should be refreshed
